title: is rumble THE most forgotten champ?
body: you at least hear people joking about skarner, morde, nunu, etc. but rumble? I have literally never heard anybody talk about him on these boards before.

replies.body: Brand got a huge buff due to DFT being removed. Rumble needs some love too.
agreed, rumble is highly untalked about
Rumble has been mentioned twice by rioters today alone.
